reviews.title: Don't ruin your trip by staying here...

reviews.text: I've been on a year long round the world trip and this has to be one of the most disappointing and expensive hostels i've stayed in in the past year.
reviews.title: Overpriced for a room

reviews.text: The staff were nice but I'm afraid that's it.  The place was so unbearably hot that we had the worst night sleep possible.  There was a small fan in the room but the girl who showed us there even admitted that it didn't really do anything. By 9pm we were so agitated by the heat that we asked the reception if there was anything else we could do to cool the room down, she took us to another room which was much cooler to collect a second fan for our room. We were only there for one night so why they didn't see the sense in moving us to the empty, cooler room I have no idea. We had even hinted that it would be a much cooler room to sleep in!
reviews.title: Basic hostel but good for a stop-over on the way to Yosemite
